item.title: Clone
item.description: Clone is a 2D platformer made in Unity.-I developed weapon system and UI for this game. -Team:Yunxiao Cai (Gameplay, UI)Christian Boyd (Gameplay, Enemy AI, Player Movement)Dong Wang (Gameplay, Enemy AI)Liam Scott (Level Design)Tanner McDougal (2D Art)

item.title: FightBackSlime!
item.description: FightBackSlime! is a 2D casual game developed in Unity.-One day I knocked my roommate(Jinrui)‘s door and asked him: “Do you have any interesting small casual game idea?“He smiled and answered me: “Sure, let's start from this one.

item.title: Fighters
item.description: Fighters is a 2D dual player fighting game made in Pygame.-I developed damage calculation logic and characters movement for this game.

item.title: Lontarot
item.description: Lontarot is a 2.5D action role-playing game made in Unity.I am working on visual effect, inventory system, UI programming and story writing for this game.-A particle effect created by me for an ability of the main character.-The menu directly inherit from my MenuLayer script.-The inventory inherit from my VerticalScrollMenuLayer script.-The inventory menu is changing its display when players click confirm button.-Team:Yunxiao Cai (Inventory System, UI Programming, Visual Effect, Story Writing)Dong Wang (AI, Player Movement, Game Structure Construction)Chong Duan (Concept Art, Pixel Art Animation)Jinrui Hu (UI Design)

item.title: MultiUserSpreadsheet
item.description: MultiUserSpreadsheet is a project developed in Windows Forms(Client) and Linux(Server) which allows multiple users to connect to the same spreadsheet and edit cells in spreadsheet simultaneously.-A screenshot of the client developed by me in Windows Forms.-Team:Yunxiao Cai (Client, Network)Dong Wang (Server, Network)Rong Xiao (Server, Network)

item.title: The Pill
item.description: The Pill is an 3D animation made in Unreal Engine 4.-I developed the lighting effect from 2:53 to 3:06 with Unreal Blueprint.I also made the animation sequence from 3:07 to 3:21.
